opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of December 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, rephrased for clarity, is:
Did the Superior Court err in reversing the trial court’s decision to exclude the testimony of Plaintiffs experts in this friction-product asbestos case?
Justice ORIE MELVIN did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
